definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="temperature" type="Number">temperature</variable><variable id="time" type="Number">time</variable><variable id="value" type="Number">value</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">SetWorldSeasonScript</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This runs the season temperature script.</comment><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">SetWorldTimeScript</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This runs the time temperature script.</comment><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">SetWorldWeatherScript</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This runs the weather temperature script.</comment><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">SetWorldWindScript</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This runs the wind temperature script.</comment><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:temperature</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This combines the temperature script values for the world.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldSeasonTemperature</field><comment h="34" pinned="false" w="385">This temperate can range between -15 to 15</comment></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldWeatherTemperature</field><comment h="37" pinned="false" w="330">This temperature is between -4 and 4.</comment></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldWindTemperature</field><comment h="37" pinned="false" w="330">This temperature is between -5 and 0.</comment></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldTimeTemperature</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This temperature is between -6 and 6.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldTemperatureC</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This applies the temperature above to C temperature.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:temperature</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:worldTemperatureF</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This converts C temperature to F temperature.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Math to calculate F</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:temperature</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.8</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">32</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
